view.interfaces

Interface IArtworkView

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ArtworkView

    public interface IArtworkView
    Interface for the list of artwork of that are or have been in the art gallery.
    Author:
    Elisa Casadio

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addData(java.lang.Object... fields)
      Adds a new artwork to be displayed.
      void attachController(IControllerArtwork ctrl)
      Attachs the controller to the ArtworkView.
      void clearData(int row)
      Deletes the selected artwork.
      void editData(int row, java.lang.Object... fields)
      Changes the selected artwork.

    • Method Detail

      • attachController

        void attachController(IControllerArtwork ctrl)
        Attachs the controller to the ArtworkView.
        Parameters:

      • addData

        void addData(java.lang.Object... fields)
        Adds a new artwork to be displayed.
        Parameters:

      • editData

        void editData(int row,
              java.lang.Object... fields)
        Changes the selected artwork.
        Parameters:
        row - the selected table's row.
        fields - the modified fields to add to the table.

      • clearData

        Deletes the selected artwork.
        Parameters:
